version_description: bug fixes

- Select templates issue is fixed
- Address format is fixed

- iPhone X support
- Ability to edit category titles
- Ability to export your resume without a photo
- Ability to choose between different date formats
- Bug fixes in cover letters
- iOS 11 fixes

If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Resume Builder to your friends!
performance improvements

performance improvements
minor bugfixes
Fixed addresses on several templates
Fixed a bug that caused the app crash on some iPhone 7 devices when previewing resumes
pdf generation issue fixes
Fixed an issue where the cover letter was lost when the app was temporarily backgrounded or the device was locked.
- Fixed an issue where it could become impossible to select certain dates in the Work experience and Education fields.
iPad bugfix: From now you can add more than 5 items to list type fields (Work Experience, Education)

One of the most suggested feature is here: ability to change the date format to month & year, or to year only.

So, you don't have to use start and end days/month anymore, if they are not needed.
Support for iOS 12
New date formats are available when you want to use month and year only
Fixed an issue on iPhone X, when copying a text from the app and a different text was pasted when switching to another app
Fixed a bug where the back icon (in Education category) sometimes wouldn't appear on iPad
You may have been getting an error message when you tried to preview your resumes from 'My CV's' section. We have fixed it now.
When pasting very large chunks of text into the Motivation letter, the app sometimes crashed on iOS 12. It's fixed now.
'Reset to defaults' option didn't work properly on some devices. Now it's fixed.
We reduced the size of some resume templates when they are exported in PDF form.
Fixed an issue that didn't let some users edit long Work experience lists.
bug fixes and performance improvements
In some devices, deleting the photo from the personal info made the app crash. Now it's fixed.
Fixed a bug preventing the status bar from always being visible.

- Fixed a bug that caused the app crash when deleting some fields of the work experience
- Fixed a bug that didn't let you see what you were typing
- iPhone XS Max support
Localized to 5 languages: Arabic, Chinese, French, Japanese, Spanish

- Fixed a bug that caused the app crash when typing text
- Fixed a bug in the date selector
The exported resumes are now compatible to upload them to one of the biggest global employment website: Monster.

- there's an option to select bullet point indicators from the keyboard easily
- generating pdf preview is much faster than previously
- small bug fixes

Love the app? Please write a review and recommend it to your friends!

- Pdf generation issue fixes
- Small bug fixes and improvements

- Fixed the position of the signature on the cover letter
- Other small bug fixes and improvements

So from now on, all of your resumes can be synced between your iOS devices.
